Package RateLimiter

Class User

java.lang.Object
RateLimiter.User
public final class User
extends java.lang.Object
This class represents a user, where we will track all the api's associated with the user.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.String,​Api> apiMap
    Used for storing the Api's associated with the user.
    private java.lang.String userID
    Each user has a unique ID used to identify them.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    User​(java.lang.String userID)
    Takes a string as input and initializes the user ID.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID)
    This method will add the api if it is present in the api index, with the default limit associated with the api.
    void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID, long specificLimit)
    Add's an Api with a user-defined limit.
    void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID, long specificLimit, long frameLength)
    Add's an Api with user-defined limit and user-defined units.
    Api getApi​(java.lang.String apiID)
    Returns the Api associated with this user.
    java.lang.String getUserID()
    Return's the ID of this user.
    void removeAll()
    Removes all the Api's associated with the user.
    void removeApi​(java.lang.String apiID)
    Removes an Api associated with this user.
    void requested​(java.lang.String apiID, Throttle throttle)
    This will send the request to the appropriate Api, and if api is not present it will add the api implicitly.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • addApi

      public void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID)
      This method will add the api if it is present in the api index, with the default limit associated with the api.
      Parameters:
      apiID - a string, which identifies an Api.

    • addApi

      public void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID, long specificLimit)
      Add's an Api with a user-defined limit. the units will default to seconds.
      Parameters:
      apiID - A string, which identifies an Api.
      specificLimit - Limit specific to user and the Api.

    • addApi

      public void addApi​(java.lang.String apiID, long specificLimit, long frameLength)
      Add's an Api with user-defined limit and user-defined units.
      Parameters:
      apiID - A string, which identifies an Api.
      specificLimit - The limit associated with the api for this user.
      frameLength - the units for the limit in milli seconds. value of 1000 wil

    • removeApi

      public void removeApi​(java.lang.String apiID)
      Removes an Api associated with this user.

    • removeAll

      public void removeAll()
      Removes all the Api's associated with the user.

    • requested

      public void requested​(java.lang.String apiID, Throttle throttle)
      This will send the request to the appropriate Api, and if api is not present it will add the api implicitly.

    • getApi

      public Api getApi​(java.lang.String apiID)
      Returns the Api associated with this user.
      Parameters:
      apiID - Used for identifying a specific Api.

    • getUserID

      public java.lang.String getUserID()
      Return's the ID of this user.
